title: [HiFi|Eros] The Black Pearl 01-02 (Eros) (1992-1993) (Pudgy-DCP)
description:
gesserit, your resident Smutmonger Supreme, presents:

   A Hitlist Fills Torrent ( <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9591710" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9591710</a>  ):

      A Collection of Releases of Erotic Comics:




         The Black Pearl 01-02 (ADULT) (1992-1993) (Pudgy-DCP)




         One of the staple tropes of the genre, though none of the previous HiFis
         deployed it - or perhaps they did do, and I merely failed to notice...


            ... Succubi!


         The structure of this series (if two issues can be called that) is unusual,
         though - the first is essentially the lead-up to the second, and the second
         is a single extensive sex scene. It looks to me like it wasn't meant to end
         there (but I haven't actually read it, so I may be wrong), but comicbookdb
         only lists these two, so the title may have been discontinued mid-arc.
